org.codice.ddf.security.common.jaxrs

Class RestSecurity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.security.common.jaxrs.RestSecurity

  • public final class RestSecurity
extends Object
    Provides methods that help with securing RESTful (jaxrs) communications.

      • setSubjectOnClient

        public static void setSubjectOnClient(Subject subject,
                                      org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.client.Client client)
        Parses the incoming subject for a saml assertion and sets that as a header on the client.
        Parameters:
        subject - Subject containing a SAML-based security token.
        client - Non-null client to set the cookie on.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if client is null
